product_name: Easton Trail AL3 Trekking Poles - Pair - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Quality and value in a trail-ready, performance package, the Easton Trail AL3 Trekking Poles feature high strength 7075 aluminum in a compact 3-section design. Length adjustments are easy with a powerful, non-slip twist lock. Tungsten carbide tips find traction in tough terrain. EVA foam grips on molded cores. The Easton Trail AL3 Trekking Poles come with summer baskets.
short_description: Quality and value in a trail-ready, performance package, the Easton Trail AL3 Trekking Poles feature high strength 7075 aluminum in a compact 3-section design.
